title: Question towards anyone familiar with lore.....
body: Can you explain to me why Lucian married Thresh's lantern?

replies.body: Alright, since you're not "baiting." Lucian didn't marry Thresh's lantern. Lucian and his wife Senna were Purifiers of the unliving. Senna's soul was stolen by Thresh and trapped within his lantern.
I am not baiting anyone. It is a legitimate question.
